featured.text: Dom said that the most important thing in this accident was __________.
According to Dom, the main reason for the accident was that __________.
How long had Tim and Dom been at sea when their boat was hit by a fishing boat?
Tim and Dom were too careless (B) nobody on the fishing ship saw them (C) the speed of the fishing ship was too fast (D) their rowboat was not strong enough 43.
In a radio interview, Dom expressed his disappointment and explained how the accident took place.

definition.zh_def: 家，住所；某些建築物的名稱或類型。
definition.en_def: A house or a place of residence; also refers to certain types of buildings.
definition.example: She invited her friends over to her dom for a party.
